channel.title: 2023-year-end-update on Scott French

item.title: 2023 Year End Update
item.description: In October I lost the thread on my guitar projects. In September school really starts getting going for my kids. In early October we have my son's birthday, then my wife's birthday. Then a family camping trip, then Halloween, Thanksgiving, colder weather, and a big, slow, frustrating project at work. Then weeks of holiday prep, family Christmas, and finally the New Year. I lost the thread! It's happened around late fall many times in past years, but it was a especially frustrating this time because in 2023 I had been making very stead progress.
